article_title: Don't Reform Certificate Of Need (CON), Repeal It

article_metadata.author: Katherine Restrepo

og.description: As I write and you read, legislators have allegedly made final closed-door agreements on Certificate of Need (CON) reform -- a law in which statists protect established health care facilities and hospitals from competition. According to Dr. Bob Graboyes of the Mercatus Center, CON fits well with his "fortress vs. frontier" [...]
